BCC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 74 Junior Assistant, Attender Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 11:09 IST
 Bank Jobs
 74 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 44,425 to 112,900




FOLLOW

The Bangalore City Cooperative Bank Limited (BCC Bank) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 74 Junior Assistant, Attender Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, 10th pass can apply for the BCC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




 If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Karnataka.

BCC Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Assistant	62	Any Degree
Attender	12	10th pass

BCC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For BC candidates: 03 Years.
For SC/ST candidates: 05 Years.

BCC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

BCC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

For Junior Assistant Posts:

For Reserved candidates: Rs. 750/-.
For Other candidates: Rs. 1000/-.

For Attender Posts:

For SC/ST, EX-SM candidates: Rs. 600/-.
For Other candidates: Rs. 800/-.

BCC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 44,425/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,12,900/- per month.
How to Apply for the BCC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the BCC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	20-08-2025
Closing date	10-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
